ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: Join the Cocoa team and help design the fundamental APIs for macOS, iOS, watchOS, and tvOS. Our team is responsible for key technologies including the AppKit, CoreData, and Foundation frameworks. We work on projects that focus on improving a broad range of developer and user experiences for all of Apple’s platforms.

ul.li: Strong object oriented programming and design skills
In-depth development experience with Objective-C or Swift
Familiarity with Foundation and CoreFoundation libraries
Excellent problem solving, critical thinking, and communication skills
Ability to work in a group

div.p: The Foundation team is looking for an engineer to help us design future Swift APIs. As a Foundation engineer, you will work closely with the rest of the Cocoa team, the Swift team, and the open source community to create API that makes it possible for developers to create great apps. You will guide this API through review processes, implementation, and testing. You will also help implement critical parts of the swift-corelibs-foundation project, along with coordinating and reviewing contributions from open source community.
Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or equivalent
Experience developing cross-platform projects Development experience on Linux
